topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Algorithms :: Genetic Algorithms

name: X-GAT
short_description: X-GAT (XML-based Genetic Algorithm Toolkit) is a Java framework to optimize problems with Genetic Algorithms (GAs). Differently from other frameworks, X-GAT contains ready-to-use GAs implementations and new features can be easily added.
